 #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;

    int main()
     {

        int t,i,n;
        cin>>t;
        vector<int> ans(1000006);
        ans[0]=1;
        ans[1]=0;
        ans[2]=1;
        for(i=3;i<=1000000;i++)
          ans[i]=(ans[i-3]+ans[i-2])%1000000009;

        while(t--)
         {
                cin>>n;
                cout<<ans[n]<<endl;
         }
     }
